verses.verse: Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3588>'If<s%> a <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H2398>sins<s%> <S%H7684>unintentionally<s%> in <S%H3605>any<s%> of the <S%H4687>things<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H4687>commanded<s%> not to be <S%H6213>done,<s%> and <S%H6213>commits<s%> <S%H259>any<s%> of them,

<S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H4899>anointed<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H2398>sins<s%> so as to <S%H819>bring<s%> <S%H819>guilt<s%> on the <S%H5971>people,<s%> then let him <S%H7126>offer<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> a <S%H6499>bull<s%> <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1241><s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>defect<s%> as a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> for the <S%H9128>sin<s%> he has <S%H2398>committed.<s%>

'And he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H6499>bull<s%> to the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and he shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H6499>bull,<s%> and <S%H7819>slay<s%> the <S%H6499>bull<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'Then the <S%H4899>anointed<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> is to <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H6499>bull<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> it to the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting,<s%>

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H2881>dip<s%> his <S%H676>finger<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> in <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H6532>veil<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary.<s%>

'The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall also <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> on the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5561>fragrant<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H6499>bull<s%> he shall <S%H8210>pour<s%> out at the <S%H3247>base<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is at the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting.<s%>

'And he shall <S%H7311>remove<s%> from it <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the <S%H6499>bull<s%> of the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering:<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that <S%H3680>covers<s%> the <S%H7130>entrails,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is on the <S%H7130>entrails,<s%>

and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3629>kidneys<s%> with the <S%H2459>fat<s%> that is on them, <S%H834>which<s%> is on the <S%H3689>loins,<s%> and the <S%H3508>lobe<s%> of the <S%H3516>liver,<s%> which he shall <S%H5493>remove<s%> with the <S%H3629>kidneys<s%>

<S%H9201>(just<s%> as it is <S%H7311>removed<s%> from the <S%H7794>ox<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings<s%>), and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> is to <S%H6999>offer<s%> them up in <S%H6999>smoke<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering.<s%>

'But the <S%H5785>hide<s%> of the <S%H6499>bull<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H1320>flesh<s%> with its <S%H7218>head<s%> and its <S%H3767>legs<s%> and its <S%H7130>entrails<s%> and its <S%H6569>refuse,<s%>

that is, <S%H3605>all<s%> [the rest of] the <S%H6499>bull,<s%> he is to <S%H3318>bring<s%> out to a <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H4480>outside<s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> <S%H413>where<s%> the <S%H1880>ashes<s%> are <S%H8211>poured<s%> out, and <S%H8313>burn<s%> it on <S%H6086>wood<s%> with <S%H784>fire;<s%> <S%H5921>where<s%> the <S%H1880>ashes<s%> are <S%H8211>poured<s%> out it shall be <S%H8313>burned.<s%>

'Now <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7686>commits<s%> <S%H7686>error,<s%> and the <S%H1697>matter<s%> <S%H5956>escapes<s%> the <S%H5869>notice<s%> of the <S%H6951>assembly,<s%> and they <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H259>any<s%> of the <S%H4687>things<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H4687>commanded<s%> not to be <S%H6213>done,<s%> and they <S%H816>become<s%> <S%H816>guilty;<s%>

when the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H2398>committed<s%> <S%H3045>becomes<s%> <S%H3045>known,<s%> then the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> a <S%H6499>bull<s%> of the <S%H1241>herd<s%> for a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering,<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting.<s%>

'Then the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H6499>bull<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and the <S%H6499>bull<s%> shall be <S%H7819>slain<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
'Then the <S%H4899>anointed<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> is to <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H6499>bull<s%> to the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting;<s%>

and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H2881>dip<s%> his <S%H676>finger<s%> in the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H5137>sprinkle<s%> [it] <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> in <S%H6440>front<s%> of the <S%H6532>veil.<s%>

'And he shall <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> on the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> he shall <S%H8210>pour<s%> out at the <S%H3247>base<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is at the <S%H6607>doorway<s%> of the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting.<s%>
'And he shall <S%H7311>remove<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H2459>fat<s%> from it and <S%H6999>offer<s%> it up in <S%H6999>smoke<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

'He shall also <S%H6213>do<s%> with the <S%H6499>bull<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as he <S%H6213>did<s%> with the <S%H6499>bull<s%> of the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering;<s%> <S%H3651>thus<s%> he shall <S%H6213>do<s%> with it. So the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for them, and they shall be <S%H5545>forgiven.<s%>

'Then he is to <S%H3318>bring<s%> out the <S%H6499>bull<s%> to [a place] <S%H4480>outside<s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and <S%H8313>burn<s%> it as he <S%H8313>burned<s%> the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H6499>bull;<s%> it is the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> for the <S%H6951>assembly.<s%>

<S%H834>'When<s%> a <S%H5387>leader<s%> <S%H2398>sins<s%> and <S%H7684>unintentionally<s%> <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H259>any<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4687>things<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H4687>commanded<s%> not to be <S%H6213>done,<s%> and he <S%H816>becomes<s%> <S%H816>guilty,<s%>

<S%H176>if<s%> his <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H2398>committed<s%> is <S%H3045>made<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> to him, he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> for his <S%H7133>offering<s%> a <S%H8163>goat,<s%> <S%H5795><s%> a <S%H2145>male<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>defect.<s%>

'And he shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H8163>goat,<s%> and <S%H7819>slay<s%> it in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> they <S%H7819>slay<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> it is a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering.<s%>

'Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> is to <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> with his <S%H676>finger,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> it on the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering;<s%> and [the rest of] its <S%H1818>blood<s%> he shall <S%H8210>pour<s%> out at the <S%H3247>base<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering.<s%>

'And <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H2459>fat<s%> he shall <S%H6999>offer<s%> up in <S%H6999>smoke<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> as [in the case of] the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings.<s%> Thus the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him in regard to his <S%H9128>sin,<s%> and he shall be <S%H5545>forgiven.<s%>

'Now <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H5315>anyone<s%> <S%H259><s%> of the <S%H776>common<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2398>sins<s%> <S%H7684>unintentionally<s%> in <S%H6213>doing<s%> <S%H259>any<s%> of the <S%H4687>things<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H4687>commanded<s%> not to be <S%H6213>done,<s%> and <S%H816>becomes<s%> <S%H816>guilty,<s%>

<S%H176>if<s%> his <S%H9128>sin,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H2398>committed<s%> is <S%H3045>made<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> to him, then he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> for his <S%H7133>offering<s%> a <S%H8166>goat,<s%> a <S%H5347>female<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>defect,<s%> for his <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H2398>committed.<s%>

'And he shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering,<s%> and <S%H7819>slay<s%> the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> at the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering.<s%>

'And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of its <S%H1818>blood<s%> with his <S%H676>finger<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> it on the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> [the rest of] its <S%H1818>blood<s%> he shall <S%H8210>pour<s%> out at the <S%H3247>base<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

'Then he shall <S%H5493>remove<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H2459>fat,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H2459>fat<s%> was <S%H5493>removed<s%> from the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings;<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>offer<s%> it up in <S%H6999>smoke<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> for a <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> Thus the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him, and he shall be <S%H5545>forgiven.<s%>

'But <S%H518>if<s%> he <S%H935>brings<s%> a <S%H3532>lamb<s%> as his <S%H7133>offering<s%> for a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering,<s%> he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> it, a <S%H5347>female<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>defect.<s%>

'And he shall <S%H5564>lay<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering,<s%> and <S%H7819>slay<s%> it for a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> they <S%H7819>slay<s%> the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering.<s%>

'And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> is to <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> with his <S%H676>finger<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> it on the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> [the rest of] its <S%H1818>blood<s%> he shall <S%H8210>pour<s%> out at the <S%H3247>base<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

'Then he shall <S%H5493>remove<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H2459>fat,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the <S%H3775>lamb<s%> is <S%H5493>removed<s%> from the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of the <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6999>offer<s%> them up in <S%H6999>smoke<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> on the <S%H801>offerings<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> Thus the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for him in <S%H5921>regard<s%> to his <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he has <S%H2398>committed,<s%> and he shall be <S%H5545>forgiven.<s%>
